PRODUCT DESCRIPTION (Max 200 characters: A low rate credit card that gives you a competitive interest rate, currently 12.74% p.a. on purchases, plus save with 0% p.a. on balance transfers for 6 months (reverts to cash advance rate).
OTHER FEATURES (Maximum 200 characters):
-Visa Entertainment special offers, which brings the best entertainment experiences from concerts and cinema to sporting events and travel offers
'-Fraudshield®
'-24/7 Customer Service
'-Emergency Card Replacement
INTEREST RATE TERMS AND CONDITIONS: The Annual Percentage Rate for purchases is currently 12.74% p.a. Interest rates are variable and subject to change. Interest rates current as at 01/01/2015.
BALANCE TRANSFER TERMS AND CONDITIONS: Your total balance transfers may not exceed 80% of your credit limit. The 0% p.a. interest rate applies to balances transferred with this offer at point of application, for a period of 6 months from the date the balance transfer is processed. At the end of the balance transfer period, the interest rate on any outstanding transferred balance will revert to the Annual Percentage Rate for Cash Advances, currently 21.99% p.a. for the Suncorp Clear Options Standard card. Interest rates are variable and subject to change. The 0% p.a. balance transfer interest rate will not be valid for transfers from other Citigroup or Suncorp Credit Cards. The interest rates are current as at 01/01/2015.This offer ends 30/06/2015.
OTHER FEATURES TERMS AND CONDITIONS: Exclusive Visa Entertainment Offers supplied by Visa. Visit www.visaentertainment.com.au for details.
GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS:

Citigroup, not Suncorp Bank, will be assessing your application.

INTEREST RATE TERMS AND CONDITIONS: The maximum 55 days interest free period applies when you pay your balance off in full for two consecutive months. If you carry a balance on your credit card from month to month, the 55 days interest free period does not apply and you are charged interest once you make a purchase. No interest free period is available on Cash Advances or Balance Transfers.
REWARDS TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- All Rewards are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Suncorp Bank Rewards Program. Cash advances do not earn Reward points. Suncorp Bank Rewards points never expire while the card remains open and in good standing. Rewards are not available on Suncorp Clear Options Standard Credit Cards. For Full terms and conditions of the Rewards Programs, please refer to the relevant Suncorp Clear Options Rewards Terms and Conditions.
'-An additional annual fee of $49 will apply to join Suncorp Bank Qantas Frequent Flyer Rewards Program. Terms and Conditions of Suncorp Bank Qantas Frequent Flyer Rewards Program apply. The Suncorp Clear Options primary cardholder must be a member of the Qantas Frequent Flyer program to earn Qantas Frequent Flyer points. A joining fee applies. Membership is subject to Qantas Frequent Flyer Rewards Program terms and conditions. Only Qantas Frequent Flyer points can be earned in Suncorp Bank Qantas Frequent Flyer Rewards Program and are subject to the terms and conditions of the Qantas Frequent Flyer Rewards Program.
BALANCE TRANSFER TERMS AND CONDITIONS: Your total balance transfers may not exceed 80% of your credit limit. At the end of the balance transfer period, the interest rate on any outstanding transferred balance will revert to the Annual Percentage Rate for Cash Advances, currently 21.99% p.a. for the Suncorp Clear Options Platinum card. Interest rates are variable and subject to change. The 0% p.a. balance transfer interest rate will not be valid for transfers from other Citigroup or Suncorp Credit Cards. The interest rates are current as at 01/01/2015.This offer ends 30/06/2015.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION (Max 200 characters: This meets the needs of small to medium sized enterprises with fewer than 50 employees who want to streamline expense management and reduce paperwork by consolidating and paying most business expenses with one account.
REWARDS DESCRIPTION (bullet points):
1 Reward point per $1 spent
Standard or Premium
'-Join the Suncorp Clear Options Rewards Program and you can choose between redeeming points at an individual or business level at a Standard or Premium Membership. You earn one reward point for every dollar spent. The maximum number of points that can be accrued is capped at 80,000 per annum for each card.
INTEREST RATE TERMS AND CONDITIONS: The maximum 55 days interest free period applies when you pay your balance off in full for 2 consecutive months. If you carry a balance on your credit card from month to month the 55 days interest free period does not apply and you are charged interested once you make a purchase. There is no interest free period for Cash Advances or Balance Transfers.
REWARDS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: All Rewards are subject to the Terms and Conditions of the Suncorp Rewards Program. Cash advances do not earn Reward points. Suncorp Reward points never expire while the card remains open.
